title: Employee Onboarding
description: Welcome to the employee onboarding process. We'll help you get set up with everything you need for your first day.

messages.content: Welcome to the onboarding process! Let's get you set up. First, please provide your full name.
What is your preferred start date?

validation.errorMessage: Please select a valid start date

messages.content: Great! Now, let's talk about your office location. We have several offices available:
Please select your preferred office location:
Let's set up your equipment. Please select the items you need:

validation.errorMessage: Please select at least one equipment item

messages.content: Please review and confirm your onboarding details. Would you like to proceed?
